ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She walked on the warm sand.  She looked out and saw CyberShark swimming.  He looked so happy to be back in the water.  She was glad that he was happy.

::Battera::

She walked on the warm sand.  She looked out and saw CyberShark 
swimming.  He looked so happy to be back in the water.  She was glad 
that he was happy.  She transformed into her bot mode and flew inches 
above the water.  She let the ocean waves splash against her face.  
She felt the cool ocean spray mist around her.  She liked the 
coolness that the ocean against her face.

She flew back to the shore and transformed into bot mode.  She sat 
down on the sun warmed sand.  She looked at CyberShark. 
"You go swim and I'll fly above you.  If I crash, you catch me OK?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He transformed to flight mode and headed toward the ocean. He 
figured 
> that she couldn't swim because anybody who has swam has loved the 
water and 
> wants to again (CyberShark only knew swimming bots, and I am a 
swimmer on a 
> team). He neared the ocean and transformed to Beast Mode. He let 
himself fall 
> toward the ocean. When he hit it felt wonderful to be back. He swam 
around 
> for a few minutes and then headed toward shore.
>     Nearing the shore he transformed back to robot mode so he 
wouldn't get 
> beached. He walked out of the water and sat on the beach. He looked 
at his 
> tail/hand, it was useless for swimming in robot mode. But he could 
manage to 
> teach someone.
> 
> (In reality I haven't taught anyone how to swim, I've just helped, 
so bear 
> with me.)
